content: this crochet sunflower book marker is so easy to make and comes out so beautiful that it will bring a little joy to the experience of reading these are great for using up scrap yarn and also make great gifts also it can be turned into a keychain or make 2 of these flowers and connect them buy a chain and make a rear view mirror hang like a pair of dice connect the keychain to your zipper on your purse and make have a zipper grab that makes your purse pop patterns for this book marker and other projects please check out my web site find all my video tutorials on my youtube page @meladora1
